name: conventionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is traditional and ordinary: Not all conventionally grown fruits are vulnerable to pests. She is not conventionally beautiful, but there is something very attractive about her. See
conventional
More examplesFewer examplesPeople look at things conventionally in politics.Organic produce is no more nutritious than conventionally grown foods.Of all these past presidents, Theodore Roosevelt could be considered the most conventionally religious.
